title: Identify the Unknown
text: We are looking for the the rate of the journey, and we can name it "r"
speech: We are looking for the the rate of the journey, and we can name it "r"
pacedSpeech: We are looking for the the rate of the journey, and we can name it "r"

title: Translate
text: We can use the formula $$distance=rate time$$ --> $$d=rt$$
speech: We can use the formula  distance is equal to, ratetime  -->  d, is equal to r t

-->   d, is equal to r t

title: Substitute
text: Since we are given that the distance is $$168$$ miles and the time is $$3$$ hours, we can substitute $$d=168$$, $$t=3$$ and get $$168=3r$$.

title: Solve
text: Solve for $$h$$ in the given equation (hint: divide both sides by 3). What is $$h$$?
